1.content: Is Shawn a boy or a girl?
1.title: First things first.

11.content:
One day Shawn was in his hammock in the backyard taking a nap. Summer vacation was starting to bore him, when a book landed on his face. He picked it up, and started to read it.

"Say each phrase, and then enter a door. You will be taken to a place that will differ from your own. Though be warned, you will change to suit that universe."

He found this interesting, so he looked through the book.
11.title: Boy

111.content:
Reading through the book, he saw a page that interested you. "In this world, you get to see the other side of the fence."

He decided to give it a try, say the chant in it, and walk though the nearest door. When he walked in, the house didn't seem different at all. Shawn shrugged it off, and walked to the kitchen to get food. When he tried to get a plate, the top shelf seemed more out of reach. "The hell? Did I shrink or something." He tried to brush the hair out of your eyes, when he noticed his fingernails were painted. Taking a more in depth look, his arm had shrunken as well. He were also wearing what appeared to be a girl's tang top, and has female shorts on. He had ran to the bathroom to find what the book meant. In this universe, he was a woman. He looked himself in the mirror for a good 5 minutes, letting the situation sink in. "This is happening. I'm a girl." he said to himself. He walked to his room, to find it also has changed. It was more more girly, with female clothes scattered about. He saw a purse, which he realize was his. He searched through it, and found his driver's license. He found his name in this universe was still Shawn, but he started to wonder what else was different.
111.title: Scenario 1

12.content: Shawn was home by herself, when she heard something hit her window. She went outside to take a look, when she saw a book. Curious why someone through a book at her window, she started to read it. It explained that it can take her to any universe she wanted, and all she needed was to saw a chant when she walked through a door..
12.title: Girl

info.brief_description: One day Shawn finds a book, but what its for is something amazing.
info.description:
Each page in the book leads to another universe. Some differ slightly, while others differ vastly.

Each dimension Shawn will change depending on that universe.

Story can have TG, AR, AP, and other stuff.
